SHOULD GET SOME OF THESE IDEAS IN HAND PRIOR TO STARTING OFF ON SOME
NEW APPROACH, THE BOARD AT ITS FINAL MEETING RECOGNIZED ALL OF THE
COMMENTS MADE AND FINALLY AMENDED ITS MOTION TAKEN LAST MAY TO INDICATE
THAT THE PRESIDENT WAS AUTHORIZED TO DISCUSS ANY PROPOSAL FOR PROGRAM
PRODUCTION MADE TO HIM, TO CONSULT WITH THE TELEVISION STATION OPERATORS
REGARDING THE ADVISABILITY OF DOING THESE PROPOSALS, AND TO SECURE
APPROVAL OF THE FULL NAEB BOARD BEFORE PRECEDING TO IMPLEMENT THEM,
IF YOU HAVE ANY STRONG FEELINGS ABOUT ANY OF THE ABOVE MENTIONED
ITEMS THAT YOU FEEL SHOULD BE REPORTED TO THE NAEB PRESIDENT OR THE
Board may I urge you to write me at your convenience. If you attended in
Philadelphia we are glad you came and hope you enjoyed yourself as much
AS WE DID. If you were unable to make this meeting we are sorry you
MISSED IT, AND HOPE SINCERELY THAT YOU WILL MAKE THE NEXT ONE IN MlLWAKEE.
